item.title: Friend or Foe
item.description: Since the beginning of humanity, man has divided his world into two camps, friends and foes, with the purpose of gratifying his pride and ambition and exercising power, dominion, or compulsion over the other camp.

item.title: Building a Bridge of Faith
item.description: Our mortal life is the time for men to meet God by building a bridge of faith, opening the door into immortality and eternal life.

item.title: The Message of the Restoration
item.description: The message of the Restoration is [an] invitation to know why the gospel of Jesus Christ and His true Church have been restored by a prophet in modern times.

item.title: Man’s Search for Divine Truth
item.description: Following the Lord’s pattern to hear and give heed to divine truth will help you build a personal spiritual foundation and determine what you will become.
